products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Mocha - Roller Blind
products.description: A combination of style and practicality, the rimini (blackout) in mocha is part of a quality collection of blackout roller-blinds. With both easy functionality and a sophisticated brown shade, the mocha will shield against the harsh glare of both daytime and nighttime lights with contemporary colour and modern style. Layer the mocha with sumptuous white linens and contrasting, velvety cloths for an elegant palette with an inviting combination of textures.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Tangerine - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) range offers practical blackout roller-blinds that are easy to use due to their simple rolling mechanism. The tangerine is a favourite for adding a burst of sunny shade and stimulating colour to any room in the home that needs brightening up. Combine the tangerine with a fun and creative contrast of cobalt blue or zesty yellow for a fun palette, matching the orange with eye-catching fabrics and features in alike shades for a striking display of character and a continued funky theme.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in black is simplicity at its best; the combination of the delicately textured blackout fabric with the classic and cool black hue makes this blind functional, stylish, and striking. The rimini black is perfect for any bedroom where the sole aim is the best nights sleep possible. Not one for the faint-hearted, this blind will make a statement in whichever room it's used, giving a particularly sleek yet moody look to any living room or dining room.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout)'s blue combines their ever popular blackout fabric, with its unique, fine texturing, with a timeless blue that is sure to add a simple splash of colour and a touch of fresh, contemporary style to any room. Use the rimini blue to match pretty florals in the bedroom for a fresh, country look, or stark whites in the kitchen for a contemporary style. It's also the perfect shade for a sea-themed bathroom or a fun, colourful playroom for the kids.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in bluebell is a classic light blue that is sure to add a touch of elegance to any home. But it's certainly not style over substance, with the rimini fabric being a top quality blackout material that provides all you need when it comes to keeping out the glare of the sun. Combine the pretty bluebell colour with soft yellows and rich creams to create a vibrant yet not overpowering colour scheme.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Cobalt - Roller Blind
products.description: Mixing practicality with modern style, the rimini (blackout) in cobalt is a high quality blackout blind with an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Featuring a striking blue tone as a bold and vibrant feature, it is sure to add a burst of alluring colour and personality wherever it goes. Display the cobalt against a contrasting white and dove grey background for a contemporary palette in a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Mint - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a highly effective, yet lightweight blackout blind, that also adds a sense of style, freshness, and vitality to your room, the rimini (blackout) in mint could be just what you're looking for. The pretty, subtle green of the mint means that this blind can not only fit in with many existing colour schemes, but is can also create the basis for a gentle, modern dcor style. Try it with darker greens or rich browns in a contemporary living room, or with stark whites in a chic, minimalist kitchen.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Primrose - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in primrose combines a best-in-class light-controlling blackout fabric with a rich, vivid yellow colouring; perfect for bringing the feel of sunshine in even when you need to block it out. This primrose colouring will brighten up any room. Consider the rimini in primrose as an addition to a white or pastel coloured landing or hallway, to add a splash of colour without the need to totally redecorate.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Who'd have thought that a beautiful cream blind could work as a blackout blind? Well, the rimini (blackout) in cream does exactly that, all while offering its creamy paleness to any window. Perfect for the bedroom or home office, this shade works wonderfully with vintage floral patterns, bold bright blues and greens, or dark, moody browns and greys. It fits equally well in a neutrally decorated room full of beiges and golds, or a pastel colour scheme full of pale pinks, dusky lilacs, or baby blues.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Ecru - Roller Blind
products.description: The perfect solution for helping your family getting a good night's sleep, or a relaxing morning lie-in, the rimini (blackout) range is an always popular collection. The ecru edition is a soothing and contemporary blind that is sure to settle into any surrounding. Feature the ecru in your bedroom for restful colour and effortless style, blending with a calm background of ivory or biscuit. Layer the blind with a contrasting, quilted fabric for an elegant frame to an otherwise modern look.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Myrtle - Roller Blind
products.description: Reminiscent of luscious green grass, the rimini (blackout) in myrtle is a stylish dark green blackout blind of the highest quality. The finely textured rimini fabric is lightweight enough to unroll with ease, yet still the ideal choice for keeping the light out to ensure a good night's sleep. The dark green hue of the myrtle contrasts beautifully against dark woods for a traditional, cosy look in a home office, or with lighter woods for a fresh, outdoorsy feel in a contemporary living room.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Terracotta - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is the cause of many a night's disturbed sleep, so opt for the popular rimini (blackout) range in your home. This practical and easy-to-use roller-blind comes in a warming terracotta shade for a punch of colour and character. Use the terracotta in a country-inspired bedroom by framing with fine textured cloth or layers of linen in a warming palette of caramel and mocha. Incorporate similar tones within the rest of the room, as well as checks or woodland prints to finish the look with character and coherency.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Wine - Roller Blind
products.description: One of the most popular ranges, the rimini (blackout) blinds are designed to keep harsh glares and light at bay, and to help you to get the best night's sleep possible. The sophisticated wine edition, in an elegant maroon shade, brings both practicality and style to your window dressing. Match the divine wine with a classy ivory background, creating a refined palette for this rich and demanding burgundy hue.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in navy is a traditional navy blue that will never go out of style. Made from the latest blackout fabric, this blind is best way control unwanted light from the outside changing the mood of your room or affecting your night's sleep. Offset the navy against a bright reds and ice whites for a fun, naval theme in a living room or bedroom. Or consider combining it with a lighter blues and purples for a beautifully stepped colour theme in a dining room or home office.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in sand is a stylish, light, and vibrant blackout blind with a subtle, patterned texture. Its simple and neutral feel makes it the perfect solution to adding style to a room. The sand colour makes this blind ideal for being added to bedrooms with a light blue colour scheme to give the whole room a natural, seaside feel throughout. Alternatively, add the sand to rooms with authentic wood features and bold tones for fantastic, striking colour contrasts.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Storm Cloud - Roller Blind
products.description: A fashionable and modern take on grey or stone, the rimini (blackout) in storm cloud certainly provides one of their must-have colours for the contemporary home. Combine this with a high-quality blackout performance and an easy-rolling fabric, this blind is a simple and functional winner. Why not use the rimini storm cloud in the sitting room to compliment bolder brights in your seating and carpet? Or it would work equally well in a minimalist kitchen or dining room where it can help accentuate a range of features such as tiling, tableware, or fitted cabinets.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) blinds offer the latest in high quality, easy-to-use fabrics, and the rimini (blackout) in grey is no different, combining the sleek fabric with an effortlessly fashionable light stone grey that is easy to integrate with a range of tastes and styles. Offset the grey against granite worktops and slate floors in a contemporary kitchen for a striking yet natural contrast in tones.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: Do you have trouble sleeping with nighttime lights and summertime sun? The rimini (blackout) range is specially designed to shield against harsh glares and unwanted light for a good night's sleep or day's relaxation, and this simple white edition does it with refined and classy style. Whilst the white will provide a refreshing lift to any surrounding, try balancing with a soothing lemon or muted lime walls for energising colour contrast.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Lime - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about trinity blackout lime is that it introduces a contemporary colour that's not afraid to be bold, and yet never overdoes things. This is a balance that's years in the making, and is sure to set your mind at ease the moment you see how it works its way into the existing space. Matching to lime is all about finding a suite of exotic shades that will enable you to take your interior design ambitions in an exciting new direction.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Blush Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Who doesn't love a touch of blush pink? It's the natural shade that reminds you of home and welcomes you through the door the moment you take out your keys. If you love subtle colour that adds depth and clarity then you need look no further. When you want to add something a little more gentle to your window spaces that disperses natural colour around the room there's perhaps no better choice than trinity (blackout) blush pink.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's one addition to their trinity blackout range that we fell in love with the moment we set eyes on it then it's their oyster grey fabric. Stone greys are very much on-trend this season, and oyster allows you to gently work in one of the most popular shades whilst also breathing new life into your decor. We love the idea of combining oyster grey with simple natural tones and textures that allow the beauty of nature to come to the fore.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Soft Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, trinity blackout soft pink adds a gentle touch to your interiors that allows you to transform the look and feel of any room your heart desires. It's all about achieving natural balance so that you can take your decor any which way you please, so go out there and do it. If you want to discover just what you can do with that awkward guest bedroom, soft pink provides the ideal starting point.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) teal is a colour that means different things to different people, which is precisely why we believe it should be celebrated at every turn. When you want to be able to reimagine your space in a way that evokes memories, this is a shade that makes it happen. The cross between blues and greens that trinity (blackout) teal provides allows you to unify two of the most sought after areas of the colour spectrum.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout plum is a fabric that needs no introduction. The vivid colour works in perfect harmony with the subtle flowing texture to create a fabric that lives long in the memory. It's exactly what you need when you're searching for something that will bring your home to life. The next step is to think about complimentary secondary colours that you can use to unify the rest of your interior.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Steel Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The beautiful thing about trinity blackout steel blue is that it allows you to lose yourself in the beautiful world of natural shades and tones. Is it a deep and moody blue? Or is it aqua blue crossed with denim? No one really knows, which means you can make it anything you want. Choosing lighter natural colours is the way to go when you want to enliven your chosen space. Think about ways to add light beiges and gentle stone greys to the mix and you'll instantly fall in love with the end result.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in coral is one of those fabrics that's hard to define when you first see it, but you know it has the star quality you've been searching for. The crisp coral pink allows you to introduce vibrant natural colour to any room your heart desires, and to do it in a way that doesn't overdo things. As you search for inspiration, why not combine coral with a dark charcoal? It's a unique colour contrast, but when you see it before your own eyes you'll instantly see what we're talking about.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Peony - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and take one look at trinity blackout peony you come to appreciate just how much work has gone into creating such an elegant colour. It's all about combining half a dozen shades you can't quite put your finger on so that you can find the perfect unifying colour for your new decor. We can't think of anything better than combining peony with similar multi-faceted blues and greens to introduce natural colours with a refined twist.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Peacock - Roller Blind
products.description: Simple and crisp, that's exactly what we thought when we sampled trinity blackout in peacock for the very first time. It's a fabric that sits gently in the background, adding a regal touch to any space you choose to debut it in. When you want to be able to shine a light on a new way of thinking, why not embrace the colourful threads peacock adds to proceedings? Match it to washed out reds and subtly faded greens to create a primary style that will allow you to rest and relax the moment you walk through the door.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Rock - Roller Blind
products.description: Our all-new trinity blackout rock fabric allows you to take your decor in numerous different directions depending on what it is that you want to achieve. It's all about neutral shades with the natural touch, and it's a great way to get truly creative with your interiors. The beauty of rock is that it adds a calming presence to any room, without being too delicate with its choice of colour. This is still a bold and eye-catching fabric.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Vanilla - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout vanilla allows you to add that subtle and refined touch of style to your home that it can be so hard to pin down. It's a gentle blend of cream and beige that sits elegantly in the background, giving your other colours the freedom to come to the fore and catch the eye. If you want to add something elegant and understated to the master bedroom then try combining vanilla with a matching rug atop a laminate floor.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing touch that no home should be without, so why hold back any longer?As you sit down and run your mind through the various different options, you need to think about how to match to your furniture.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Ash - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in the subtle aesthetic of trinity blackout ash it would be all too easy to think that it's another stone grey fabric. Look closer however and you'll soon see that this couldn't be wider of the mark. It's a gentle grey that has a slightly earthy quality from which it takes it name. The beauty of this type of unifying colour is that it allows you to introduce all sorts of other shades into your chosen space.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: As you lie back and put your feet up for the evening you want to be able to feel at ease. The beauty of their new trinity blackout dusk fabric is that it catches the magic of this most restful of times of day, and leaves you feeling at peace. Combining dusk with a gentle washed out green is a great way to introduce natural colour to the living room without overdoing things. It's all about creating a relaxing space that you never want to leave, so take your time with it and the answers will appear before your eyes.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout white is a roller blind that allows you to drift off into a deep sleep the moment your head hits the pillow. With a light and breezy design that's easy on the eye, and crafted with care from their signature blackout fabric, it's everything you need to create your own little oasis of calm. Matching trinity white with neutral walls and light stained floors is an inspired choice if you want to create a bedroom that you can rest and relax in before bedtime.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Soft Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you how love the simple elegance of everyday colours combined with flawless craftsmanship, their new trinity (blackout) soft grey fabric has everything you've been looking for. It's all about taking the time to appreciate what it adds to your space, and then pairing it with the complimentary touches that will make all the difference. As you take in the serenity and tranquility of trinity (blackout) soft grey you can sense the ideas coming together.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Mauve - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the modern aesthetic of trinity blackout mauve because it allows you to take your time, sit back, and take it all in. This is a deep and moody colour that entices you in to take a closer look, and then puts your mind at ease. If you want to be able to add some style to the upstairs landing then why not match your runner to mauve? You could even stagger your photos down the stairs so that you can create a transitory feature wall that follows you as you transition between floors.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Pewter is a blackout fabric with a difference, and one that we guarantee you'll fall in love with the moment you see it in your home. It's all about introducing natural tones that introduce an understated sense of style. Simple, authentic, and homely; these are the 3 words which instantly come to mind. Sit back and take in the different creative avenues that you have at your disposal and you'll be able to take your decor in an exciting new direction.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Lipstick - Roller Blind
products.description: Decorating is as much about setting existing spaces free of their longstanding constraints as it is about breathing new life into your home. Trinity blackout lipstick adds style and flair to any room in the house, and does it all by staying true to the contemporary colours that you're searching for. When you want to be able to add a real talking point to the dining room there's no better way to do it than by taking lipstick as the starting point.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Stone from their ever-popular trinity blackout range allows you to add a calming combination of country chic and contemporary minimalism to your chosen space. It's all about enjoying the relaxing nature of the fabric, and using it to create a space you never want to leave. Sitting back and thinking about which direction you want to take your decor in is the name of the game here. Do you go contemporary? Or do you go down the country route? The choice is yours, and the options are incredible.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Poppy Red - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) poppy red is a colour that evokes memories, passion, and plenty of amazing new ideas. It's all about taking the time to fall in love with your decor, and not being afraid to try something new. The gentle weave sits in the background, but it's the homely red that really catches the eye. Matching to trinity (blackout) poppy red is all about taking the time to get the balance right.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Canary - Roller Blind
products.description: The thing that first caught their eye when taking in canary from their trinity blackout range is the way in which it illuminates the room. As the yellow shines bright you get a real sense of proportion and scale for the very first time, no matter how compact your chosen space. It's all about introducing balancing colours like sky blue and grassy greens. That way you can capture the essence of natural colour without running the risk of overdoing things.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Sea Green - Roller Blind
products.description: Take one look at trinity blackout in sea green, and what do you see? To us it's an electric infusion that allows you to take your mind back to those days spent by the coast. The sun, the sea, and the clear blue sky all come to mind, and yet sea green still offers something more. Matching to sea green is something you may feel is a subtle art given how striking it is, but that just means you might be overthinking things.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in denim is so much more than a fabric that allows you to get the perfect restful sleep mind and body need. It's a contemporary shade whose texture really brings the colour to life, and allows you to do something a little bit special. We love the idea of hanging denim in the kitchen so that you can turn on the style when it's time to cook up a feast. If you have the option to match it to the tiling then even better, but don't feel like you have to constrain yourself when the time comes to make a change.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Fuschia - Roller Blind
products.description: We love trinity blackout in fuschia for a couple of reasons. Firstly, it allows you to drift off into the deep sleep that will leave you feeling rested and relaxed the moment you wake. And secondly, it allows the electricity to flow into the room and enliven any space the instant you lower your blinds. If you love the idea of creating the perfect chill out space, why not add fuschia to the lounge? Add a glass coffee table, matching entertainment unit, and think about other modern touches you can introduce along the way.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a shadow you think of the absence of light, but what if you could turn conventional wisdom on its head? Trinity blackout shadow welcomes you into a world in which nothing is quite what it seems, and your dark fabric is actually a natural charcoal that brings any space to life. We love the idea of pairing shadow with light lively natural shades to provide some natural balance and contrast.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout steel is the subtle blend of greys and metallic blues that is set to be one of the breakout colours of the season. It's one of those intersectional colours that allows you to add a unifying presence to any room in the house, and to do it all in a refined and elegant way. If you want to be able to connect the various features in the bedroom then steel could be the hub you've been waiting for.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Flint - Roller Blind
products.description: When it comes to natural colours that allow you to introduce a unifying sense of calm to your chosen space, trinity blackout flint may just be the answer you seek. It's colour is true to its name, and allows you to take your decor in a dozen difference directions. If you want to be able to introduce natural textures and still keep the contemporary look you love, think about real wooden furniture and leather seating to match your new rollers.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The one thing that we love about trinity blackout light grey is that it allows you to lose yourself in the moment the instant you set eyes on it. Take one look at the finely woven fabric and you get a sense of the regal calm you could add to your decor. We love the idea of hanging light grey against some pale magnolia walls, and above a light pine effect laminate floor. That way you can celebrate the way in which these neutral shades compliment one another as you sit back and take it all in.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) black smoke is a colour that you perhaps don't expect to find all that often, but it's certainly a welcome surprise when you find it staring right back at you. The beauty of the washed blue is that it clearly sits atop a foundation of light grey that gives it a natural stone-like quality. This is a fabric that has 'versatility' as its middle name, so why not embrace the new creative avenues that it opens? It's all about allowing your individuality to run free so that you can really put your own stamp on things.
